bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I collect nectar.
🍯 I make something sweet!
🐝 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
⚫ I have spots.
🍀 People think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🦗 I have strong legs for jumping.
🎶 I make a noise by rubbing my legs together.

bug.question: I crawl very slowly and leave a shiny trail. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I carry my house on my back.
🌱 I like to eat plants.
✨ I leave a slimy, silvery path.

bug.question: I build a big nest with lots of other bugs. We all work together. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but very strong.
🧺 I carry food back to my home.
🏘️ We live in colonies.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then change into something beautiful that can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I'm young.
📦 I spend time in a chrysalis.
🦋 I have colorful wings.

bug.question: I can walk on walls and ceilings. Some people are scared of me, but I eat other bugs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I sometimes spin a web.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
⚫ I am an arachnid.

bug.question: I live in water when I am young, and then I grow wings and fly. I love to be near ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ I start my life in the water.
🌿 My young self eats smaller insects.
💎 I have big, shiny eyes and wings.

bug.question: I am a nocturnal insect known for my glowing abdomen.

hints.text: 🔦 I light up the night.
⚫️ I am a beetle.
🌙 You can usually find me in the summer.

bug.question: I can blend in with sticks and leaves, making it hard to see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a part of a tree.
🍃 My camouflage helps me hide from predators.
🚶 I am long and thin and can be mistaken for a twig.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give off heat.
🌞 I am the center of our solar system.
💛 You need sunglasses to look at me!

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, and you can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Sometimes I look like cheese.
🌑 I change my shape.
🐺 Werewolves like me!

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that makes its own light, far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.
🌟 I am much bigger than the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.
🌍 I am third from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a red planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I'm the color of chocolate.
🚀 People want to visit me.
🔴 I am named after the god of war.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have a giant red spot.
💨 I am a gas giant.
👑 I am named after the king of the gods.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a gas giant.
👴 I'm named after the god of agriculture.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us are bears.
🌌 You can find me at night.
✨ The Big Dipper is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a very big group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I'm huge, even bigger than the Solar System.
🌌 The Milky Way is one of me.
✨ I'm where stars are born!

cosmos.question: I am a rocky or icy object that flies around the Sun, sometimes with a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be seen from Earth when I get close to the Sun.
❄️ I am made of ice, dust and rock.
💫 My tail always points away from the sun.
